content.text:
on this hot ass day of july i have realized how much i fuckin hate summer, there is not a damn thing to like about it! its hot, the only thing to do outside without sweating is swim but swimming kinda sucks! AND NOT TO MENTION that when you live in a literal fucking oven of a trailer, all your devices overheat so fast! in other news im working on a song! i hope it will go well cause im kinda creativly dead.
welp thats all im leaving now! <3
